  145: 
  146: -define(TIMEOUT, 120000). % 2 min
  147: -define(PASSWORD1, "1234abcd").
  148: -define(PASSWORD2, "4567efgh").
  149: 
  150: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  151: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
  152: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  153: 
  154: suite() -> 
  155:     [].
  156: 
  157: all() -> 
  158:     [app, 
  159:      appup,
  160:      {group, pem_decode_encode},
  161:      encrypt_decrypt,
  162:      encrypt_decrypt_sign_fun,
  163:      {group, sign_verify},
  164:      pkix, 
  165:      pkix_countryname, 
  166:      pkix_emailaddress, 
  167:      pkix_decode_cert,
  168:      pkix_path_validation,
  169:      pkix_path_validation_root_expired,
  170:      pkix_ext_key_usage,
  171:      pkix_path_validation_bad_date,
  172:      pkix_iso_rsa_oid, 
  173:      pkix_iso_dsa_oid, 
  174:      pkix_dsa_sha2_oid,
  175:      pkix_crl, 
  176:      pkix_hash_type,
  177:      general_name,
  178:      pkix_verify_hostname_cn,
  179:      pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName,
  180:      pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName_IP,
  181:      pkix_verify_hostname_options,
  182:      pkix_dist_point_uri,
  183:      pkix_test_data_all_default,
  184:      pkix_test_data,
  185:      pkix_is_issuer,
  186:      short_cert_issuer_hash, 
  187:      short_crl_issuer_hash,
  188:      cacerts_load,
  189:      ocsp_extensions,
  190:      pkix_ocsp_validate
  191:     ].
  192: 
  193: groups() -> 
  194:     [{pem_decode_encode, [], [dsa_pem, rsa_pem, rsa_pss_pss_pem, ec_pem,
  195: 			      encrypted_pem_pwdstring, encrypted_pem_pwdfun,
  196: 			      dh_pem, cert_pem, pkcs7_pem, pkcs10_pem, ec_pem2,
  197: 			      rsa_priv_pkcs8, dsa_priv_pkcs8, ec_priv_pkcs8,
  198: 			      eddsa_priv_pkcs8, eddsa_priv_rfc5958,
  199: 			      ec_pem_encode_generated, gen_ec_param_prime_field,
  200: 			      gen_ec_param_char_2_field]},
  201:      {sign_verify, [], [rsa_sign_verify, rsa_pss_sign_verify, dsa_sign_verify,
  202:                         eddsa_sign_verify_24_compat, custom_sign_fun_verify]}
  203:     ].
  204: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  205: init_per_suite(Config) ->
  206:     application:stop(crypto),
  207:     try crypto:start() of
  208:         ok ->
  209:             application:start(asn1),
  210:             Config
  211:     catch _:_ ->
  212: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  213:     end.
  214: 
  215: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  216:     application:stop(asn1),
  217:     application:stop(crypto).
  218: 
  219: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  220: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  221:     Config.
  222: 
  223: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
  224:     Config.
  225: %%-------------------------------------------------------------------
  226: 
  227: init_per_testcase(pkix_test_data_all_default, Config) ->
  228:      case crypto:ec_curves() of
  229:          [] ->
  230:              {skip, missing_ecc_support};
  231:          _ ->
  232:              init_common_per_testcase(Config)
  233:      end;
  234: 
  235: init_per_testcase(gen_ec_param_prime_field=TC, Config) ->
  236:     init_per_testcase_gen_ec_param(TC, secp521r1, Config);
  237: 
  238: init_per_testcase(gen_ec_param_char_2_field=TC, Config) ->
  239:     init_per_testcase_gen_ec_param(TC, sect571r1, Config);
  240: 
  241: init_per_testcase(rsa_pss_sign_verify, Config) ->
  242:     Supports = crypto:supports(),
  243:     RSAOpts = proplists:get_value(rsa_opts, Supports),
  244: 
  245:     case lists:member(rsa_pkcs1_pss_padding, RSAOpts) 
  246:         andalso lists:member(rsa_pss_saltlen, RSAOpts) 
  247:         andalso lists:member(rsa_mgf1_md, RSAOpts) of
  248:         true ->
  249:             Config;
  250:         false ->
  251:             {skip, not_supported_by_crypto}
  252:     end;
  253: 
  254: init_per_testcase(eddsa_sign_verify_24_compat, Config) ->
  255:     case lists:member(eddsa, crypto:supports(public_keys)) of
  256:         true ->
  257:             Config;
  258:         false ->
  259:             {skip, eddsa_not_supported_by_crypto}
  260:     end;
  261: 
  262: init_per_testcase(TestCase, Config) ->
  263:     case TestCase of
  264:         ec_pem_encode_generated ->
  265:             init_ec_pem_encode_generated(Config);
  266: 	_ -> init_common_per_testcase(Config)
  267:     end.
  268: 	
  269: init_common_per_testcase(Config0) ->
  270:     Config = lists:keydelete(watchdog, 1, Config0),
  271:     Dog = ct:timetrap(?TIMEOUT),
  272:     [{watchdog, Dog} | Config].
  273: 
  274: 
  275: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
  276:     ok.
  277: 
  278: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  279: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  280: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  281: 
  282: app() ->
  283:     [{doc, "Test that the public_key app file is ok"}].
  284: app(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  285:     ok = test_server:app_test(public_key).
  286: 
  287: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  288: 
  289: appup() ->
  290:     [{doc, "Test that the public_key appup file is ok"}].
  291: appup(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  292:     ok = test_server:appup_test(public_key).
  293: 
  294: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  295: 
  296: dsa_pem() ->
  297:     [{doc, "DSA PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  298: dsa_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  299:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  300: 
  301:      [{'DSAPrivateKey', DerDSAKey, not_encrypted} = Entry0 ] =
  302: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "dsa.pem")),
  303: 
  304:     DSAKey = public_key:der_decode('DSAPrivateKey', DerDSAKey),
  305: 
  306:     DSAKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry0),
  307: 
  308:     {ok, DSAPubPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "dsa_pub.pem")),
  309:     [{'SubjectPublicKeyInfo', _, _} = PubEntry0] =
  310:         public_key:pem_decode(DSAPubPem),
  311:     DSAPubKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PubEntry0),
  312:     true = check_entry_type(DSAPubKey, 'DSAPublicKey'),
  313:     PubEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('SubjectPublicKeyInfo', DSAPubKey),
  314:     DSAPubPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(DSAPubPem),
  315:     DSAPubPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PubEntry0])).
  316: 
  317: dsa_priv_pkcs8() ->
  318:     [{doc, "DSA PKCS8 private key decode/encode"}].
  319: dsa_priv_pkcs8(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  320:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  321:     {ok, DsaPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "dsa_key_pkcs8.pem")),
  322:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', DerDSAKey, not_encrypted} = Entry0 ] = public_key:pem_decode(DsaPem),
  323:     DSAKey = public_key:der_decode('PrivateKeyInfo', DerDSAKey),
  324:     DSAKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry0),
  325:     true = check_entry_type(DSAKey, 'DSAPrivateKey'),
  326:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('PrivateKeyInfo', DSAKey),
  327:     DSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(DsaPem),
  328:     DSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  329: 
  330: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  331: 
  332: rsa_pem() ->
  333:     [{doc, "RSA PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  334: rsa_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  335:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  336:     [{'RSAPrivateKey', DerRSAKey, not_encrypted} =  Entry0 ] =
  337: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "client_key.pem")),
  338: 
  339:     RSAKey0 = public_key:der_decode('RSAPrivateKey', DerRSAKey),
  340: 
  341:     RSAKey0 = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry0),
  342:     
  343:     [{'RSAPrivateKey', _, {_,_}} = Entry1] =
  344: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "rsa.pem")),
  345: 
  346:     true = check_entry_type(public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry1, "abcd1234"),
  347: 			    'RSAPrivateKey'),
  348: 
  349:     {ok, RSAPubPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "rsa_pub.pem")),
  350:     [{'SubjectPublicKeyInfo', _, _} = PubEntry0] =
  351:         public_key:pem_decode(RSAPubPem),
  352:     RSAPubKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PubEntry0),
  353:     true = check_entry_type(RSAPubKey, 'RSAPublicKey'),
  354:     PubEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('SubjectPublicKeyInfo', RSAPubKey),
  355:     RSAPubPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(RSAPubPem),
  356:     RSAPubPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PubEntry0])),
  357: 
  358:     {ok, RSARawPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "rsa_pub_key.pem")),
  359:     [{'RSAPublicKey', _, _} = PubEntry1] =
  360:         public_key:pem_decode(RSARawPem),
  361:     RSAPubKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PubEntry1),
  362:     RSARawPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(RSARawPem),
  363:     RSARawPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PubEntry1])).
  364: 
  365: rsa_pss_pss_pem() ->
  366:     [{doc, "RSA PKCS8 RSASSA-PSS private key decode/encode"}].
  367: rsa_pss_pss_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  368:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  369:     {ok, RsaPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "rsa_pss_pss_key.pem")),
  370:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', DerRSAKey, not_encrypted} = Entry0 ] = public_key:pem_decode(RsaPem),
  371:     {RSAKey, Parms} = public_key:der_decode('PrivateKeyInfo', DerRSAKey),
  372:     {RSAKey, Parms} = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry0),
  373:     true = check_entry_type(RSAKey, 'RSAPrivateKey'),
  374:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('PrivateKeyInfo', {RSAKey, Parms}),
  375:     RSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(RsaPem),
  376:     RSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  377: 
  378: rsa_priv_pkcs8() ->
  379:     [{doc, "RSA PKCS8 private key decode/encode"}].
  380: rsa_priv_pkcs8(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  381:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  382:     {ok, RsaPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "rsa_key_pkcs8.pem")),
  383:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', DerRSAKey, not_encrypted} = Entry0 ] = public_key:pem_decode(RsaPem),
  384:     RSAKey = public_key:der_decode('PrivateKeyInfo', DerRSAKey),
  385:     RSAKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry0),
  386:     true = check_entry_type(RSAKey, 'RSAPrivateKey'),
  387:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('PrivateKeyInfo', RSAKey),
  388:     RSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(RsaPem),
  389:     RSAPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  390: 
  391: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  392: 
  393: ec_pem() ->
  394:     [{doc, "EC key PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  395: ec_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  396:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  397:     {ok, ECPubPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ec_pubkey.pem")),
  398:     [{'SubjectPublicKeyInfo', _, _} = PubEntry0] =
  399:         public_key:pem_decode(ECPubPem),
  400:     ECPubKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PubEntry0),
  401:     true = check_entry_type(ECPubKey, 'ECPoint'),
  402:     PubEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('SubjectPublicKeyInfo', ECPubKey),
  403:     ECPubPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(ECPubPem),
  404:     ECPubPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PubEntry0])),
  405:     
  406:     {ok, ECPrivPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ec_key.pem")),
  407:     [{'EcpkParameters', _, not_encrypted} = Entry1,
  408:      {'ECPrivateKey', _, not_encrypted} = Entry2] = public_key:pem_decode(ECPrivPem),
  409:     
  410:     ECParams = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry1),
  411:     true = check_entry_type(ECParams, 'EcpkParameters'),
  412:     ECPrivKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry2),
  413:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey, 'ECPrivateKey'),
  414:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.parameters, 'EcpkParameters'),
  415:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(ECPrivPem),
  416:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([Entry1, Entry2])).
  417:     
  418: ec_pem2() ->
  419:     [{doc, "EC key w/explicit params PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  420: ec_pem2(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  421:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  422: 
  423:     %% Load key with explicit curve parameters.  Generated with...
  424:     %% openssl ecparam -name secp521r1 -genkey -param_enc explicit -out ec_key2.pem
  425:     {ok, ECPrivPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ec_key2.pem")),
  426:     [{'EcpkParameters', _, not_encrypted} = Entry1,
  427:      {'ECPrivateKey', _, not_encrypted} = Entry2] = public_key:pem_decode(ECPrivPem),
  428: 
  429:     ECParams = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry1),
  430:     true = check_entry_type(ECParams, 'EcpkParameters'),
  431:     ECPrivKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry2),
  432:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey, 'ECPrivateKey'),
  433:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.parameters, 'EcpkParameters'),
  434:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(ECPrivPem),
  435:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([Entry1, Entry2])).
  436: 
  437: ec_priv_pkcs8() ->
  438:     [{doc, "EC PKCS8 private key decode/encode"}].
  439: ec_priv_pkcs8(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  440:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  441:     {ok, ECPrivPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ec_key_pkcs8.pem")),
  442:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', _, not_encrypted} = PKCS8Key] = public_key:pem_decode(ECPrivPem),
  443:     ECPrivKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PKCS8Key),
  444:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey, 'ECPrivateKey'),
  445:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.parameters, 'EcpkParameters'),
  446:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('PrivateKeyInfo', ECPrivKey),
  447:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(ECPrivPem),
  448:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  449: 
  450: eddsa_priv_pkcs8() ->
  451:     [{doc, "EDDSA PKCS8 private key decode/encode"}].
  452: eddsa_priv_pkcs8(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  453:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  454:     {ok, ECPrivPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "eddsa_key_pkcs8.pem")),
  455:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', _, not_encrypted} = PKCS8Key] = public_key:pem_decode(ECPrivPem),
  456:     ECPrivKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PKCS8Key),
  457:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey, 'ECPrivateKey'),
  458:     true = ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.parameters == {namedCurve, ?'id-Ed25519'},
  459:     true = size(ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.privateKey) == 32,
  460:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('PrivateKeyInfo', ECPrivKey),
  461:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(ECPrivPem),
  462:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  463: 
  464: eddsa_priv_rfc5958() ->
  465:     [{doc, "EDDSA PKCS8 private key decode/encode"}].
  466: eddsa_priv_rfc5958(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  467:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  468:     {ok, ECPrivPem} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "eddsa_key_rfc5958.pem")),
  469:     [{'PrivateKeyInfo', _, not_encrypted} = PKCS8Key] = public_key:pem_decode(ECPrivPem),
  470:     ECPrivKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(PKCS8Key),
  471:     true = check_entry_type(ECPrivKey, 'ECPrivateKey'),
  472:     true = ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.parameters == {namedCurve, ?'id-Ed25519'},
  473:     true = size(ECPrivKey#'ECPrivateKey'.privateKey) == 32,
  474:     PrivEntry0 = public_key:pem_entry_encode('OneAsymmetricKey', ECPrivKey),
  475:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(ECPrivPem),
  476:     ECPemNoEndNewLines = strip_superfluous_newlines(public_key:pem_encode([PrivEntry0])).
  477: 
  478: eddsa_sign_verify_24_compat(_Config) ->
  479:     Key =
  480:         {'ECPrivateKey',1,
  481:          <<15,192,10,239,169,93,9,105,143,13,221,71,191,255,201,
  482:            60,8,80,43,234,82,68,151,219,233,144,174,41,227,241,
  483:            229,232>>,
  484:          {namedCurve,{1,3,101,112}},
  485:          <<209,208,142,135,125,251,57,203,2,49,232,74,238,214,170,
  486:            181,23,107,221,39,187,225,106,19,34,133,117,198,138,
  487:            180,16,70>>,
  488:          asn1_NOVALUE},
  489:     Body =
  490:         <<83,83,72,83,73,71,0,0,0,4,116,101,120,116,0,0,0,0,0,0,0,6,115,104,97,
  491:           53,49,50,0,0,0,64,119,199,206,154,93,134,187,56,109,68,59,185,99,144,
  492:           250,161,32,99,49,88,105,156,136,68,195,11,19,171,11,249,39,96,183,228,
  493:           65,106,234,57,125,185,27,74,192,229,221,86,184,239,126,75,6,97,98,171,
  494:           31,220,8,131,25,206,109,239,200,118>>,
  495:     ExpectedSignature =
  496:         <<203,148,171,54,165,4,216,251,189,124,35,227,88,183,187,225,142,10,132,163,98,
  497:           48,167,195,67,12,49,148,85,146,41,14,58,0,198,68,103,114,90,61,31,38,200,198,
  498:           64,179,135,138,31,172,236,105,0,71,50,195,168,247,216,110,210,61,159,5>>,
  499:     lists:foreach(
  500:       fun(Sha) ->
  501:               ct:log("Try Sha = ~p", [Sha]),
  502:               try
  503:                   case public_key:sign(Body, Sha, Key) of
  504:                       ExpectedSignature ->
  505:                           ct:log("sign Sha ~p ok", [Sha]),
  506:                           ExpectedSignature;
  507:                       Others ->
  508:                           ct:log("Sha: ~p~nGot:    ~p~nExpect: ~p", [Sha,Others,ExpectedSignature]),
  509:                           ct:fail("Bad sign result")
  510:                   end
  511:               of
  512:                   Sig ->
  513:                       try
  514:                           case public_key:verify(Body, Sha, Sig, Key) of
  515:                               true ->
  516:                                   ct:log("verify Sha ~p ok", [Sha]);
  517:                               false ->
  518:                                   ct:fail("Bad verify result for ~p",[Sha])
  519:                           end
  520:                       catch
  521:                           C:E ->
  522:                               ct:log("Verify: ~p:~p  Sha = ~p", [C,E,Sha]),
  523:                               ct:fail("Bad verify",[])
  524:                       end
  525:               catch
  526:                   C:E ->
  527:                       ct:log("Sign: ~p:~p  Sha = ~p", [C,E,Sha]),
  528:                       ct:fail("Bad sign",[])
  529:               end
  530:       end, [undefined, none | crypto:supports(hashs)]).
  531: 
  532: 
  533: init_ec_pem_encode_generated(Config) ->
  534:     case catch true = lists:member('secp384r1', crypto:ec_curves()) of
  535:         {'EXIT', _} -> {skip, {'secp384r1', not_supported}};
  536:         _           -> init_common_per_testcase(Config)
  537:     end.
  538: 
  539: ec_pem_encode_generated() ->
  540:     [{doc, "PEM-encode generated EC key"}].
  541: ec_pem_encode_generated(_Config) ->
  542: 
  543:     Key1 = public_key:generate_key({namedCurve, 'secp384r1'}),
  544:     public_key:pem_entry_encode('ECPrivateKey', Key1),
  545: 
  546:     Key2 = public_key:generate_key({namedCurve, ?'secp384r1'}),
  547:     public_key:pem_entry_encode('ECPrivateKey', Key2).
  548: 
  549: 
  550: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  551: 
  552: encrypted_pem_pwdstring() ->
  553:     [{doc, "Encrypted PEM-file decode/encode with password string used"}].
  554: encrypted_pem_pwdstring(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  555:     encrypted_pem(Config, ?PASSWORD1, ?PASSWORD2).
  556: 
  557: encrypted_pem_pwdfun() ->
  558:     [{doc, "Encrypted PEM-file decode/encode with password fun used"}].
  559: encrypted_pem_pwdfun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  560:     encrypted_pem(Config, fun() -> ?PASSWORD1 end, fun() -> ?PASSWORD2 end).
  561: 
  562: encrypted_pem(Config, Password1, Password2) ->
  563:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  564:     [{'RSAPrivateKey', DerRSAKey, not_encrypted}] =
  565:         erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "client_key.pem")),
  566:     RSAKey = public_key:der_decode('RSAPrivateKey', DerRSAKey),
  567:     SupportedCiphers = crypto:supports(ciphers),
  568:     SupportedECB = lists:member(des_ecb, SupportedCiphers),
  569:     SupportedDES = lists:member(des_cbc, SupportedCiphers),
  570:     case SupportedECB of
  571:         true ->
  572:             encrypted_pem_des_ede(Datadir, RSAKey, Password1);
  573:         false ->
  574:             ct:comment("DES-EDE3-CBC not supported")
  575:     end,
  576:     case SupportedDES of
  577:         true ->
  578:             encrypted_pem_des_cbc(Datadir, RSAKey, Password2);
  579:         false ->
  580:             ct:comment("DES-CBC not supported")
  581:     end.
  582: encrypted_pem_des_ede(Datadir, RSAKey, Password) ->
  583:     Salt = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(8),
  584:     Entry = public_key:pem_entry_encode('RSAPrivateKey', RSAKey,
  585:                                         {{"DES-EDE3-CBC", Salt}, ?PASSWORD1}),
  586:     RSAKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry, Password),
  587:     Des3KeyFile = filename:join(Datadir, "des3_client_key.pem"),
  588:     erl_make_certs:der_to_pem(Des3KeyFile, [Entry]),
  589:     [{'RSAPrivateKey', _, {"DES-EDE3-CBC", Salt}}] =
  590:         erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(Des3KeyFile).
  591: 
  592: encrypted_pem_des_cbc(Datadir, RSAKey, Password) ->
  593:     Salt = crypto:strong_rand_bytes(8),
  594:     Entry = public_key:pem_entry_encode('RSAPrivateKey', RSAKey,
  595:                                         {{"DES-CBC", Salt}, ?PASSWORD2}),
  596:     DesKeyFile = filename:join(Datadir, "des_client_key.pem"),
  597:     erl_make_certs:der_to_pem(DesKeyFile, [Entry]),
  598:     [{'RSAPrivateKey', _, {"DES-CBC", Salt}} = Entry] =
  599:         erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(DesKeyFile),
  600:     {ok, Pem} = file:read_file(DesKeyFile),
  601:     check_encapsulated_header(Pem),
  602:     true = check_entry_type(public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry, Password),
  603:                             'RSAPrivateKey').
  604: 
  605: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  606: 
  607: dh_pem() ->
  608:     [{doc, "DH parametrs PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  609: dh_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  610:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  611:     [{'DHParameter', _DerDH, not_encrypted} = Entry] =
  612: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "dh.pem")),
  613:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry).
  614: 
  615: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  616: 
  617: pkcs10_pem() ->
  618:    [{doc, "PKCS-10 PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  619: pkcs10_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  620:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  621:     [{'CertificationRequest', _DerPKCS10, not_encrypted} = Entry] =
  622: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "req.pem")),
  623:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry).
  624: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  625: pkcs7_pem() ->
  626:     [{doc, "PKCS-7 PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  627: pkcs7_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  628:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  629:     [{'ContentInfo', _, not_encrypted} = Entry0] =
  630: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "pkcs7_cert.pem")),
  631:     [{'ContentInfo', _, not_encrypted} = Entry1] =
  632: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "pkcs7_ext.pem")),
  633:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry0),
  634:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry1).
  635:       
  636: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  637: cert_pem() ->
  638:     [{doc, "Certificate PEM-file decode/encode"}].
  639: cert_pem(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  640:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  641:    
  642:     [{'Certificate', _, not_encrypted} = Entry0] =  
  643: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "client_cert.pem")),
  644:     
  645:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry0),
  646:     
  647:     [{'Certificate', _, not_encrypted} = Entry1, 
  648:      {'Certificate', _, not_encrypted} = Entry2] = 
  649:         erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem")),
  650:     
  651:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry1),
  652:     asn1_encode_decode(Entry2).
  653: 
  654: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  655: encrypt_decrypt() ->
  656:     [{doc, "Test public_key:encrypt_private and public_key:decrypt_public"}].
  657: encrypt_decrypt(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  658:     {PrivateKey, _DerKey} = erl_make_certs:gen_rsa(64),
  659:     #'RSAPrivateKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp} = PrivateKey,
  660:     PublicKey = #'RSAPublicKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp},
  661:     Msg = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(5, "Foo bar 100")),
  662:     RsaEncrypted = public_key:encrypt_private(Msg, PrivateKey),
  663:     Msg = public_key:decrypt_public(RsaEncrypted, PublicKey),
  664:     RsaEncrypted2 = public_key:encrypt_public(Msg, PublicKey),
  665:     Msg = public_key:decrypt_private(RsaEncrypted2, PrivateKey),
  666:     ok.
  667: 
  668: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  669: encrypt_decrypt_sign_fun() ->
  670:     [{doc, "Test public_key:encrypt_private with user provided sign_fun"}].
  671: encrypt_decrypt_sign_fun(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  672:     {PrivateKey, _DerKey} = erl_make_certs:gen_rsa(64),
  673:     #'RSAPrivateKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp} = PrivateKey,
  674:     EncryptFun = fun (PlainText, Options) ->
  675:             public_key:encrypt_private(PlainText, PrivateKey, Options)
  676:         end,
  677:     CustomPrivKey = #{encrypt_fun => EncryptFun},
  678:     PublicKey = #'RSAPublicKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp},
  679:     Msg = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(5, "Foo bar 100")),
  680:     RsaEncrypted = public_key:encrypt_private(Msg, CustomPrivKey),
  681:     Msg = public_key:decrypt_public(RsaEncrypted, PublicKey),
  682:     ok.
  683:        
  684: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  685: rsa_sign_verify() ->
  686:     [{doc, "Checks that we can sign and verify rsa signatures."}].
  687: rsa_sign_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  688:     Ca = {_, CaKey} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([]),
  689:     {Cert1, _} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{key, dsa}, {issuer, Ca}]),
  690:     PrivateRSA = #'RSAPrivateKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp} = 
  691: 	public_key:pem_entry_decode(CaKey),
  692:     PublicRSA = #'RSAPublicKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp},
  693:     true = public_key:pkix_verify(Cert1, PublicRSA),
  694: 
  695:     Msg = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(5, "Foo bar 100")),
  696:     RSASign = public_key:sign(Msg, sha, PrivateRSA),
  697:     true = public_key:verify(Msg, sha, RSASign, PublicRSA), 
  698:     false = public_key:verify(<<1:8, Msg/binary>>, sha, RSASign, PublicRSA), 
  699:     false = public_key:verify(Msg, sha, <<1:8, RSASign/binary>>, PublicRSA), 
  700: 
  701:     RSASign1 = public_key:sign(Msg, md5, PrivateRSA),
  702:     true = public_key:verify(Msg, md5, RSASign1, PublicRSA).
  703:     
  704: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  705: rsa_pss_sign_verify() ->
  706:     [{doc, "Checks that we can sign and verify rsa pss signatures."}].
  707: rsa_pss_sign_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  708:     CertChainConf  = #{server_chain => 
  709:                            #{root => [],
  710:                              intermediates => [],
  711:                              peer => []},
  712:                        client_chain => 
  713:                            #{root => [{key, {hardcode_rsa_key(1), pss_params(sha256)}}],
  714:                              intermediates => [],
  715:                              peer => []}},
  716:     #{client_config := ClientConf} = public_key:pkix_test_data(CertChainConf),
  717:     Cert = proplists:get_value(cert, ClientConf),
  718:     {#'RSAPrivateKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp}, Parms} = {hardcode_rsa_key(1), pss_params(sha256)},
  719:            
  720:     true = public_key:pkix_verify(Cert, {#'RSAPublicKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp}, Parms}).
  721:     
  722: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  723: 
  724: dsa_sign_verify() ->
  725:     [{doc, "Checks that we can sign and verify dsa signatures."}].
  726: dsa_sign_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  727:     Ca = erl_make_certs:make_cert([]),
  728:     CertInfo = {_,CertKey1} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{key, dsa}, {issuer, Ca}]),
  729:     {Cert2,_CertKey} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{issuer, CertInfo}]),
  730: 
  731:     #'DSAPrivateKey'{p=P, q=Q, g=G, y=Y, x=_X} =
  732: 	public_key:pem_entry_decode(CertKey1),
  733:     true = public_key:pkix_verify(Cert2, {Y, #'Dss-Parms'{p=P, q=Q, g=G}}),
  734: 
  735:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  736:     [DsaKey = {'DSAPrivateKey', _, _}] = 
  737: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "dsa.pem")), 
  738:     DSAPrivateKey = public_key:pem_entry_decode(DsaKey),
  739:     #'DSAPrivateKey'{p=P1, q=Q1, g=G1, y=Y1, x=_X1} = DSAPrivateKey,
  740: 
  741:     Msg = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(5, "Foo bar 100")),
  742:     DSASign = public_key:sign(Msg, sha, DSAPrivateKey),
  743:     DSAPublicKey = Y1,
  744:     DSAParams = #'Dss-Parms'{p=P1, q=Q1, g=G1},
  745:     true = public_key:verify(Msg, sha, DSASign, {DSAPublicKey, DSAParams}), 
  746:     false = public_key:verify(<<1:8, Msg/binary>>, sha, DSASign, 
  747: 			      {DSAPublicKey, DSAParams}), 
  748:     false = public_key:verify(Msg, sha, <<1:8, DSASign/binary>>, 
  749: 			      {DSAPublicKey, DSAParams}), 
  750:     
  751:     Digest = crypto:hash(sha,Msg),
  752:     DigestSign = public_key:sign(Digest, none, DSAPrivateKey),
  753:     true = public_key:verify(Digest, none, DigestSign, {DSAPublicKey, DSAParams}), 
  754:     <<_:8, RestDigest/binary>> = Digest,
  755:     false = public_key:verify(<<1:8, RestDigest/binary>>, none, DigestSign, 
  756: 			      {DSAPublicKey, DSAParams}), 
  757:     false = public_key:verify(Digest, none, <<1:8, DigestSign/binary>>, 
  758: 			      {DSAPublicKey, DSAParams}).
  759: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  760: 
  761: custom_sign_fun_verify() ->
  762:     [{doc, "Checks that public_key:sign correctly calls the `sign_fun`"}].
  763: custom_sign_fun_verify(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  764:     {_, CaKey} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{key, rsa}]),
  765:     PrivateRSA = public_key:pem_entry_decode(CaKey),
  766:     #'RSAPrivateKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp} = PrivateRSA,
  767:     PublicRSA = #'RSAPublicKey'{modulus=Mod, publicExponent=Exp},
  768:     SignFun = fun (Msg, HashAlgo, Options) ->
  769:             public_key:sign(Msg, HashAlgo, PrivateRSA, Options)
  770:         end,
  771:     CustomKey = #{algorithm => rsa, sign_fun => SignFun},
  772: 
  773:     Msg = list_to_binary(lists:duplicate(5, "Foo bar 100")),
  774:     RSASign = public_key:sign(Msg, sha, CustomKey),
  775:     true = public_key:verify(Msg, sha, RSASign, PublicRSA),
  776:     false = public_key:verify(<<1:8, Msg/binary>>, sha, RSASign, PublicRSA),
  777:     false = public_key:verify(Msg, sha, <<1:8, RSASign/binary>>, PublicRSA),
  778: 
  779:     RSASign1 = public_key:sign(Msg, md5, CustomKey),
  780:     true = public_key:verify(Msg, md5, RSASign1, PublicRSA).
  781: 
  782: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  783: pkix() ->
  784:     [{doc, "Misc pkix tests not covered elsewhere"}].
  785: pkix(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  786:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
  787:     Certs0 = erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem")),
  788:     Certs1 = erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "client_cert.pem")),
  789:     TestTransform = fun({'Certificate', CertDer, not_encrypted}) ->
  790: 			    PlainCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CertDer, plain),
  791: 			    OtpCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CertDer, otp),
  792: 			    CertDer = 
  793: 				public_key:pkix_encode('OTPCertificate', OtpCert, otp),
  794: 			    CertDer = 
  795: 				public_key:pkix_encode('Certificate', PlainCert, plain),
  796: 			    OTPTBS = OtpCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
  797: 			    OTPSubj = OTPTBS#'OTPTBSCertificate'.subject, 
  798: 			    DNEncoded = public_key:pkix_encode('Name', OTPSubj, otp),
  799: 			    PlainTBS = PlainCert#'Certificate'.tbsCertificate,
  800: 			    Subj2 = PlainTBS#'TBSCertificate'.subject,
  801: 			    DNEncoded = public_key:pkix_encode('Name', Subj2, plain),
  802: 
  803: 			    false = public_key:pkix_is_fixed_dh_cert(CertDer)
  804: 		    end,
  805:     [TestTransform(Cert) || Cert <- Certs0 ++ Certs1],
  806: 
  807:     Root = element(2, hd(Certs0)),
  808:     Peer = element(2, hd(Certs1)), 
  809: 
  810:     true = public_key:pkix_is_self_signed(Root),
  811:     false = public_key:pkix_is_self_signed(Peer),
  812: 
  813:     CaIds = [element(2, public_key:pkix_issuer_id(Cert, self)) || 
  814: 		{'Certificate', Cert, _} <- Certs0],
  815:     {ok, IssuerId} = 
  816: 	public_key:pkix_issuer_id(Peer, other),
  817:     
  818:     {ok, Id} = public_key:pkix_issuer_id(Root, self),
  819:     Id = public_key:pkix_subject_id(Root),
  820: 
  821:     true = lists:member(IssuerId, CaIds),
  822: 
  823:     %% Should be normalized already
  824:     TestStr   = {rdnSequence, 
  825: 		 [[{'AttributeTypeAndValue', {2,5,4,3},{printableString,"ERLANGCA"}}],
  826: 		  [{'AttributeTypeAndValue', {2,5,4,3},{printableString," erlang  ca "}}]]},
  827:     VerifyStr = {rdnSequence, 
  828: 		 [[{'AttributeTypeAndValue', {2,5,4,3},{printableString,"erlangca"}}],
  829: 		  [{'AttributeTypeAndValue', {2,5,4,3},{printableString,"erlang ca"}}]]},   
  830:     VerifyStr = public_key:pkix_normalize_name(TestStr).
  831:     
  832:   
  833: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  834: pkix_countryname() ->
  835:     [{doc, "Test workaround for certs that code x509countryname as utf8"}].
  836: pkix_countryname(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  837:     Cert = incorrect_countryname_pkix_cert(),
  838:     OTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp),
  839:     TBSCert = OTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
  840:     Issuer = TBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.issuer,
  841:     Subj   = TBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.subject,
  842:     check_countryname(Issuer),
  843:     check_countryname(Subj).
  844: 
  845: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  846: pkix_emailaddress() ->
  847:     [{doc, "Test workaround for certs that code emailAddress as utf8"}].
  848: pkix_emailaddress(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  849:     Cert = incorrect_emailaddress_pkix_cert(),
  850:     OTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp),
  851:     TBSCert = OTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.tbsCertificate,
  852:     Issuer = TBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.issuer,
  853:     Subj   = TBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.subject,
  854:     check_emailaddress(Issuer),
  855:     check_emailaddress(Subj).
  856: 
  857: 
  858: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  859: pkix_decode_cert() ->
  860:     [{doc, "Test that extension IssuerDistributionPoint is not decoded in 'otp' decoding mode. We want to leave it for later "
  861:       "to increase interopability for sites that does not use this extension and will not care if it is properly encoded"}].
  862: pkix_decode_cert(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  863:     Der = base64:decode(
  864:             <<"MIICXDCCAgKgAwIBAgIBATAKBggqhkjOPQQDAjApMRkwFwYDVQQFExBjOTY4NDI4OTMyNzUwOGRiMQwwCgYDVQQMDANURUUwHhcNMjIxMDI5MTczMTA3WhcNMjkwNDE2MjAzNDUzWjAfMR0wGwYDVQQDExRBbmRyb2lkIEtleXN0b3JlIEtleTBZMBMGByqGSM49AgEGCCqGSM49AwEHA0IABFmIQDus/jIZ0cPnRCITCzUUuCjQBw8MetO6154mmTL8O/fFlGgYkZ6C8jSSntKC/lMwaZHxAgW1AGgoCrPuX5ejggEjMIIBHzALBgNVHQ8EBAMCB4AwCAYDVR0fBAEAMIIBBAYKKwYBBAHWeQIBEQSB9TCB8gIBAgoBAQIBAwoBAQQgyvsSa116xqleaXs6xA84wqpAPWFgaaTjCWBnZpHslmoEADBEv4VFQAQ+MDwxFjAUBAxjb20ud2hhdHNhcHACBA0+oAQxIgQgOYfQQ9EK769ahxCzZxQY/lfg4ZtlPJ34JVj+tf/OXUQweqEFMQMCAQKiAwIBA6MEAgIBAKUIMQYCAQYCAQSqAwIBAb+DdwIFAL+FPQgCBgGEJMweob+FPgMCAQC/hUAqMCgEIFNB5rJkaXmnDldlMAeh8xAWlCHsm92fGlZI91reAFrxAQH/CgEAv4VBBQIDAV+Qv4VCBQIDAxUYMAoGCCqGSM49BAMCA0gAMEUCIF0BwvRQipVoaz5SIhsYbIeK+FHbAjWPgOxWgQ6Juq64AiEA83ZLsK37DjZ/tZNRi271VHQqIU8mdqUIMboVUiy3DaM=">>),
  865: 
  866:     #'OTPCertificate'{} = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Der, otp).
  867: 
  868: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  869: pkix_path_validation() ->
  870:     [{doc, "Test PKIX path validation"}].
  871: pkix_path_validation(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  872:     CaK = {Trusted,_} = 
  873: 	erl_make_certs:make_cert([{key, dsa},
  874: 			     {subject, [
  875: 					{name, "Public Key"},
  876: 					{?'id-at-name', {printableString, "public_key"}},
  877: 					{?'id-at-pseudonym', {printableString, "pubkey"}},
  878: 					{city, "Stockholm"},
  879: 					{country, "SE"},
  880: 					{org, "erlang"},
  881: 					{org_unit, "testing dep"}
  882: 				       ]}
  883: 			    ]),
  884:     ok = erl_make_certs:write_pem("./", "public_key_cacert", CaK),
  885: 
  886:     CertK1 = {Cert1, _} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{issuer, CaK}]),
  887:     CertK2 = {Cert2,_} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{issuer, CertK1}, 
  888: 					      {digest, md5}, {extensions, false}]),
  889:     ok = erl_make_certs:write_pem("./", "public_key_cert", CertK2),
  890:     
  891:     {ok, _} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(Trusted, [Cert1], []),
  892:     
  893:     {error, {bad_cert,invalid_issuer}} = 
  894: 	public_key:pkix_path_validation(Trusted, [Cert2], []),
  895:    
  896:     {ok, _} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(Trusted, [Cert1, Cert2], []),    
  897: 
  898:     {error, {bad_cert, duplicate_cert_in_path}} =
  899: 	public_key:pkix_path_validation(Trusted, [Cert1, Cert1, Cert2], []),
  900: 
  901:     {error, issuer_not_found} = public_key:pkix_issuer_id(Cert2, other),
  902: 
  903:     CertK3 = {Cert3,_}  = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{issuer, CertK1}, 
  904: 					       {extensions, [{basic_constraints, false}]}]),
  905:     {Cert4,_}  = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{issuer, CertK3}, {extensions, [{key_usage, undefined}]}]),
  906: 
  907:     {error, {bad_cert,missing_basic_constraint}} =
  908: 	public_key:pkix_path_validation(Trusted, [Cert1, Cert3,Cert4], []),
  909: 
  910:     VerifyFunAndState0  = {fun(_,{bad_cert, missing_basic_constraint}, UserState) ->
  911: 				   {valid, UserState};
  912: 			      (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  913: 				   {fail, Reason};
  914: 			      (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
  915: 				   {unknown, UserState};
  916: 			      (_, valid, UserState) ->
  917: 				   {valid, UserState};
  918: 			      (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
  919: 				   {valid, UserState}
  920: 			   end, []},
  921:     {ok, _} =
  922: 	public_key:pkix_path_validation(Trusted, [Cert1, Cert3,Cert4],
  923: 					[{verify_fun, VerifyFunAndState0}]),
  924: 
  925:     {error, {bad_cert, unknown_ca}} =
  926: 	public_key:pkix_path_validation(unknown_ca, [Cert1, Cert3, Cert4], []),
  927: 
  928:     VerifyFunAndState1 =
  929: 	{fun(_,{bad_cert, unknown_ca}, UserState) ->
  930: 		 {valid, UserState};
  931: 	    (_,{bad_cert, _} = Reason, _) ->
  932: 		 {fail, Reason};
  933: 	    (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
  934: 		 {unknown, UserState};
  935: 	    (_, valid, UserState) ->
  936: 		 {valid, UserState}
  937: 	 end, []},
  938: 
  939:     {ok, _} =
  940: 	public_key:pkix_path_validation(unknown_ca, [Cert1], [{verify_fun,
  941: 							      VerifyFunAndState1}]),
  942: 
  943:     VerifyFunAndState2 =
  944:         {fun(_, {bad_cert, selfsigned_peer}, _UserState) ->
  945:                   {fail, custom_reason};
  946:             (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
  947: 		          {unknown, UserState};
  948: 	        (_, valid, UserState) ->
  949: 		          {valid, UserState}
  950:         end, []},
  951: 
  952:     {error, custom_reason} =
  953:         public_key:pkix_path_validation(selfsigned_peer, [Trusted], [{verify_fun,
  954:                                                                       VerifyFunAndState2}]),
  955:     % check RSASSA-PSS key
  956:     % RsaPssKey = {public_key:generate_key({rsa, 1024, 65537}), pss_params(sha256)},
  957:     RsaPssKey = {hardcode_rsa_key(1), pss_params(sha256)},
  958: 
  959:     _CaKPSS = {TrustedPSSCert,_} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{key, RsaPssKey},
  960:                  {subject, [
  961:                     {name, "RSASSA-PSS Public Key"},
  962:                     {?'id-at-name', {printableString, "public_key"}},
  963:                     {?'id-at-pseudonym', {printableString, "pubkey"}},
  964:                     {city, "Stockholm"},
  965:                     {country, "SE"},
  966:                     {org, "erlang"},
  967:                     {org_unit, "testing dep"}
  968:                        ]}
  969:                 ]),
  970:     _ChainPSSCert = {CertPSS, _} = erl_make_certs:make_cert([{issuer, {TrustedPSSCert,RsaPssKey}}]),
  971:     {ok, _} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(TrustedPSSCert, [CertPSS], []).
  972: 
  973: pkix_path_validation_root_expired() ->
  974:     [{doc, "Test root expiration so that it does not fall between chairs"}].
  975: pkix_path_validation_root_expired(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  976:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
  977:     SRoot = public_key:pkix_test_root_cert("OTP test server ROOT", [{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day}, 
  978:                                                                                 {Year-1, Month, Day}}}]),
  979:     #{server_config := Conf} = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => SRoot,
  980:                                                                              intermediates => [],
  981:                                                                              peer => []},
  982:                                                            client_chain => #{root => [], 
  983:                                                                              intermediates => [],
  984:                                                                              peer => []}}),
  985:     [ICA, Root] = proplists:get_value(cacerts, Conf),
  986:     true = public_key:pkix_is_self_signed(Root),
  987:     Peer = proplists:get_value(cert, Conf),
  988:     {error, {bad_cert, cert_expired}} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(Root, [ICA, Peer], []).
  989:     
  990: pkix_ext_key_usage() ->
  991:     [{doc, "Extended key usage is usually in end entity certs, may be in CA but should not be critical in such case"}].
  992: pkix_ext_key_usage(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  993:     SRootSpec = public_key:pkix_test_root_cert("OTP test server ROOT", []),
  994:     CRootSpec = public_key:pkix_test_root_cert("OTP test client ROOT", []),
  995: 
  996:     FailCAExt = [#'Extension'{extnID = ?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
  997:                               extnValue = [?'anyExtendedKeyUsage'],
  998:                               critical = true}],
  999:     CAExt = [#'Extension'{extnID = ?'id-ce-extKeyUsage',
 1000:                           extnValue = [?'anyExtendedKeyUsage'],
 1001:                           critical = false}],
 1002: 
 1003:     #{server_config := SConf,
 1004:       client_config := CConf} = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => #{root => SRootSpec,
 1005:                                                                              intermediates => [[{extensions, FailCAExt}]],
 1006:                                                                              peer => []},
 1007:                                                            client_chain => #{root => CRootSpec,
 1008:                                                                              intermediates => [[{extensions, CAExt}]],
 1009:                                                                              peer => []}}),
 1010:     [_STRoot, SICA, SRoot] = proplists:get_value(cacerts, SConf),
 1011:     [_CTRoot, CICA, CRoot] = proplists:get_value(cacerts, CConf),
 1012:     SPeer = proplists:get_value(cert, SConf),
 1013:     CPeer = proplists:get_value(cert, CConf),
 1014: 
 1015:     {error, {bad_cert, invalid_ext_key_usage}} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(SRoot, [SICA, SPeer], []),
 1016: 
 1017:     {ok, _} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(CRoot, [CICA, CPeer], []).
 1018: 
 1019: pkix_path_validation_bad_date() ->
 1020:     [{doc, "Ensure bad date formats in `validity` are handled gracefully by verify fun"}].
 1021: pkix_path_validation_bad_date(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1022:     % Load PEM certchain from file
 1023:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1024:     {ok, Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir,"bad_date_certchain.pem")),
 1025: 
 1026:     % Decode and extract raw der encoded certificates
 1027:     CertificateList = public_key:pem_decode(Bin),
 1028:     [Root | CertificateChain] = lists:map(fun({'Certificate', Der, _}) -> Der end, CertificateList),
 1029: 
 1030:     % First test error `invalid_validity_dates` being returned correctly without `verify_fun` override
 1031:     {error, {bad_cert, invalid_validity_dates}} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(Root, CertificateChain, []),
 1032: 
 1033:     % Then test no exception thrown if verify_fun function traps the date error
 1034:     {ok, _} = public_key:pkix_path_validation(Root, CertificateChain, [
 1035:        {verify_fun, % This is the same as ?DEFAULT_VERIFYFUN, but it handles `invalid_validity_dates` gracefully.
 1036:             {fun
 1037:                 % Test if we can successfully override `invalid_validity_dates`
 1038:                 (_, {bad_cert, invalid_validity_dates}, UserState) ->
 1039:                     {valid, UserState};
 1040:                 (_,{extension, _}, UserState) ->
 1041: 		            {unknown, UserState};
 1042:                 (_, valid_peer, UserState) ->
 1043: 				    {valid, UserState};
 1044:                 (_, valid, UserState) ->
 1045:                     {valid, UserState}
 1046:             end, []}
 1047:         }
 1048:     ]).
 1049: 
 1050: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1051: %% To generate the PEM file contents:
 1052: %%
 1053: %% openssl req -x509 -nodes -newkey rsa:1024 -keyout /dev/null -subj '/C=SE/CN=example.com/CN=*.foo.example.com/CN=a*b.bar.example.com/O=erlang.org' > public_key_SUITE_data/pkix_verify_hostname_cn.pem
 1054: %%
 1055: %% Note that the same pem-file is used in pkix_verify_hostname_options/1
 1056: %%
 1057: %% Subject: C=SE, CN=example.com, CN=*.foo.example.com, CN=a*b.bar.example.com, O=erlang.org
 1058: %% extensions = no subjAltName
 1059: 
 1060: pkix_verify_hostname_cn(Config) ->
 1061:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1062:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir,"pkix_verify_hostname_cn.pem")),
 1063:     Cert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(element(2,hd(public_key:pem_decode(Bin))), otp),
 1064: 
 1065:     %% Check that 1) only CNs are checked,
 1066:     %%            2) an empty label does not match a wildcard and
 1067:     %%            3) a wildcard does not match more than one label
 1068:     false = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"erlang.org"},
 1069: 						   {dns_id,"foo.EXAMPLE.com"},
 1070: 						   {dns_id,"b.a.foo.EXAMPLE.com"}]),
 1071: 
 1072:     %% Check that a hostname is extracted from a https-uri and used for checking:
 1073:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"HTTPS://EXAMPLE.com"}]),
 1074: 
 1075:     %% Check wildcard matching one label:
 1076:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"a.foo.EXAMPLE.com"}]),
 1077: 
 1078:     %% Check wildcard with surrounding chars matches one label:
 1079:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"accb.bar.EXAMPLE.com"}]),
 1080: 
 1081:     %% Check that a wildcard with surrounding chars matches an empty string:
 1082:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://ab.bar.EXAMPLE.com"}]).
 1083: 
 1084: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1085: %% To generate the PEM file contents:
 1086: %%
 1087: %% openssl req -x509 -nodes -newkey rsa:1024 -keyout /dev/null -extensions SAN -config  public_key_SUITE_data/verify_hostname.conf 2>/dev/null > public_key_SUITE_data/pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName.pem
 1088: %%
 1089: %% Subject: C=SE, CN=example.com
 1090: %% Subject Alternative Name: DNS:kb.example.org, DNS:*.example.org, URI:http://www.example.org, URI:https://wws.example.org
 1091: 
 1092: pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName(Config) ->
 1093:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1094:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir,"pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName.pem")),
 1095:     Cert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(element(2,hd(public_key:pem_decode(Bin))), otp),
 1096: 
 1097:     %% Check that neither a uri nor dns hostname matches a CN if subjAltName is present:
 1098:     false = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://example.com"},
 1099: 						   {dns_id,"example.com"}]),
 1100: 
 1101:     %% Check that a uri_id matches a URI subjAltName:
 1102:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://wws.example.org"}]),
 1103: 
 1104:     %% Check that a dns_id does not match a URI subjAltName:
 1105:     false = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"www.example.org"},
 1106: 						   {dns_id,"wws.example.org"}]),
 1107: 
 1108:     %% Check that a dns_id matches a DNS subjAltName:
 1109:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"kb.example.org"}]),
 1110:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"KB.EXAMPLE.ORG"}]),
 1111: 
 1112:     %% Check that a dns_id does not match a DNS subjAltName with wildcard
 1113:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"other.example.org"}]),
 1114: 
 1115:     %% Check that a dns_id does match a DNS subjAltName with wildcard with matchfun
 1116:     MatchFun = {match_fun, public_key:pkix_verify_hostname_match_fun(https)},
 1117:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"other.example.org"}], [MatchFun]),
 1118:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"OTHER.EXAMPLE.ORG"}], [MatchFun]),
 1119: 
 1120:     %% Check that a uri_id does not match a DNS subjAltName with wildcard
 1121:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://other.example.org"}]),
 1122:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://OTHER.EXAMPLE.ORG"}]),
 1123: 
 1124:     %% Check that a dns_id does match a DNS subjAltName with wildcard with matchfun
 1125:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://other.example.org"}], [MatchFun]),
 1126:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://OTHER.EXAMPLE.ORG"}], [MatchFun]),
 1127:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://OTHER.example.org"}], [MatchFun]),
 1128: 
 1129:     ok.
 1130: 
 1131: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1132: %% Uses the pem-file for pkix_verify_hostname_cn
 1133: %% Subject: C=SE, CN=example.com, CN=*.foo.example.com, CN=a*b.bar.example.com, O=erlang.org
 1134: pkix_verify_hostname_options(Config) ->
 1135:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1136:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir,"pkix_verify_hostname_cn.pem")),
 1137:     Cert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(element(2,hd(public_key:pem_decode(Bin))), otp),
 1138:     
 1139:     %% Check that the fail_callback is called and is presented the correct certificate:
 1140:     true = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"erlang.org"}],
 1141: 					   [{fail_callback,
 1142: 					     fun(#'OTPCertificate'{}=C) when C==Cert -> 
 1143: 						     true; % To test the return value matters
 1144: 						(#'OTPCertificate'{}=C) -> 
 1145: 						     ct:log("~p:~p: Wrong cert:~n~p~nExpect~n~p",
 1146: 							    [?MODULE, ?LINE, C, Cert]),
 1147: 						     ct:fail("Wrong cert, see log");
 1148: 						(C) -> 
 1149: 						     ct:log("~p:~p: Bad cert: ~p",[?MODULE,?LINE,C]),
 1150: 						     ct:fail("Bad cert, see log")
 1151: 					     end}]),
 1152:     
 1153:     %% Check the callback for user-provided match functions:
 1154:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"very.wrong.domain"}],
 1155: 					    [{match_fun,
 1156: 					      fun("very.wrong.domain", {cn,"example.com"}) ->
 1157: 						      true;
 1158: 						 (_, _) ->
 1159: 						      false
 1160: 					      end}]),
 1161:     false = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"not.example.com"}],
 1162: 					    [{match_fun, fun(_, _) -> default end}]),
 1163:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"example.com"}],
 1164: 					    [{match_fun, fun(_, _) -> default end}]),
 1165: 
 1166:     %% Check the callback for user-provided fqdn extraction:
 1167:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"some://very.wrong.domain"}],
 1168: 					    [{fqdn_fun,
 1169: 					      fun({uri_id, "some://very.wrong.domain"}) ->
 1170: 						      "example.com";
 1171: 						 (_) ->
 1172: 						      ""
 1173: 					      end}]),
 1174:     true =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://example.com"}],
 1175: 					    [{fqdn_fun, fun(_) -> default end}]),
 1176:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"some://very.wrong.domain"}]),
 1177: 
 1178:     true = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"example.com"}]),
 1179:     true = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"abb.bar.example.com"}]),
 1180:     false = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"example.com"},
 1181:                                                    {dns_id,"abb.bar.example.com"}],
 1182:                                             [{fqdn_fun,fun(_)->undefined end}]),
 1183:     %% Test that a common name is matched fully, that is do not allow prefix matches
 1184:     %% with less dots (".")
 1185:     {ok, PrefixBin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir,"prefix-dots.pem")),
 1186:     PrefixCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(element(2,hd(public_key:pem_decode(PrefixBin))), otp),
 1187:     true = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(PrefixCert, [{dns_id,"..a"}]),
 1188:     false = public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(PrefixCert, [{dns_id,".a"}]).
 1189: 
 1190: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1191: %% To generate the PEM file contents:
 1192: %%
 1193: %% openssl req -x509 -nodes -newkey rsa:1024 -keyout /dev/null -extensions SAN -config  public_key_SUITE_data/verify_hostname_ip.conf 2>/dev/null > public_key_SUITE_data/pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName_IP.pem
 1194: %%
 1195: %% Subject: C=SE, CN=example.com
 1196: %% Subject Alternative Name: DNS:1.2.3.4, DNS: abcd:ef::1, IP:10.67.16.75, URI:https://10.11.12.13
 1197: 
 1198: pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName_IP(Config) ->
 1199:     DataDir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1200:     {ok,Bin} = file:read_file(filename:join(DataDir,"pkix_verify_hostname_subjAltName_IP.pem")),
 1201:     Cert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(element(2,hd(public_key:pem_decode(Bin))), otp),
 1202: 
 1203:     %% Print the tests that a matchfun has to handle
 1204:     catch public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{some_tag,"some.domain"},
 1205:                                                  {ip, {10,67,16,75}}
 1206:                                                 ],
 1207:                                           [{match_fun,
 1208:                                             fun(Ref,Pres) -> 
 1209:                                                     ct:pal("~p:~p:~nRef : ~p~nPres: ~p",[?MODULE,?LINE,Ref,Pres]),
 1210:                                                     false
 1211:                                             end}]),
 1212: 
 1213:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://1.2.3.4"}]),
 1214:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{uri_id,"https://10.11.12.13"}]),
 1215:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"1.2.3.4"}]),
 1216:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,<<"1.2.3.4">>}]),
 1217:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{dns_id,"10.67.16.75"}]),
 1218:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, "aBcD:ef:0::0:1"}]),
 1219:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, {16#abcd,16#ef,0,0,0,0,0,1}}]),
 1220:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, "10.67.16.75"}]),
 1221:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, <<"10.67.16.75">>}]),
 1222:     true  =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, {10,67,16,75}}]),
 1223:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, {1,2,3,4}}]),
 1224:     false =  public_key:pkix_verify_hostname(Cert, [{ip, {10,11,12,13}}]).
 1225: 
 1226: 
 1227: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1228: 
 1229: pkix_dist_point_uri() ->
 1230:  [{doc, "Disregard ldap URIs in code path handling HTTP URIs"}].
 1231: pkix_dist_point_uri(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1232:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1233:     {ok, PemCert} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "ldap_uri_cert.pem")),
 1234:     [{_, Cert, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(PemCert),
 1235:     #'OTPCertificate'{tbsCertificate = TBSCert} = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp),
 1236: 
 1237:     Extensions = pubkey_cert:extensions_list(TBSCert#'OTPTBSCertificate'.extensions),
 1238:     DpExt = pubkey_cert:select_extension(?'id-ce-cRLDistributionPoints', Extensions),
 1239:     #'Extension'{extnValue = DPs} = DpExt,
 1240:     [#'DistributionPoint'{distributionPoint = {fullName, DPNames}}|_] = DPs,
 1241:     ct:pal("~p", [DPNames]),
 1242:     true = pubkey_crl:match_one(DPNames, [{uniformResourceIdentifier, "http://ca.eait.uq.edu.au/crl/labs-LILY-CA"}]).
 1243: 
 1244: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1245: 
 1246: pkix_iso_rsa_oid() ->
 1247:  [{doc, "Test workaround for supporting certs that use ISO oids"
 1248:    " 1.3.14.3.2.29 instead of PKIX/PKCS oid"}].
 1249: pkix_iso_rsa_oid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1250:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1251:     {ok, PemCert} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "rsa_ISO.pem")),
 1252:     [{_, Cert, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(PemCert),
 1253:     OTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp),
 1254:     SigAlg = OTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.signatureAlgorithm,
 1255:     {_, rsa} = public_key:pkix_sign_types(SigAlg#'SignatureAlgorithm'.algorithm).
 1256: 
 1257: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1258: pkix_iso_dsa_oid() ->
 1259:  [{doc, "Test workaround for supporting certs that use ISO oids"
 1260:    "1.3.14.3.2.27 instead of PKIX/PKCS oid"}].
 1261: pkix_iso_dsa_oid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1262:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1263:     {ok, PemCert} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "dsa_ISO.pem")),
 1264:     [{_, Cert, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(PemCert),
 1265:     OTPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(Cert, otp),
 1266:     SigAlg = OTPCert#'OTPCertificate'.signatureAlgorithm,
 1267:     {_, dsa} = public_key:pkix_sign_types(SigAlg#'SignatureAlgorithm'.algorithm).
 1268: 
 1269: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1270: pkix_dsa_sha2_oid() ->
 1271:  [{doc, "Test support dsa_sha2 oid"}].
 1272: pkix_dsa_sha2_oid(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1273:     {sha224, dsa} = public_key:pkix_sign_types(?'id-dsa-with-sha224'),
 1274:     {sha256, dsa} = public_key:pkix_sign_types(?'id-dsa-with-sha256').
 1275:     
 1276: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1277: 
 1278: pkix_crl() ->
 1279:     [{doc, "test pkix_crl_* functions"}].
 1280: 
 1281: pkix_crl(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1282:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1283:     {ok, PemCRL} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "idp_crl.pem")),
 1284:     [{_, CRL, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(PemCRL),
 1285:     
 1286:     {ok, IDPPemCert} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "idp_cert.pem")),
 1287:     [{_, IDPCert, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(IDPPemCert),
 1288: 
 1289:     {ok, SignPemCert} = file:read_file(filename:join(Datadir, "crl_signer.pem")),
 1290:     [{_, SignCert, _}] = public_key:pem_decode(SignPemCert),
 1291:     
 1292:     OTPIDPCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(IDPCert, otp),
 1293:     OTPSignCert = public_key:pkix_decode_cert(SignCert, otp),
 1294:     ERLCRL = public_key:der_decode('CertificateList',CRL),
 1295: 
 1296:     {rdnSequence,_} = public_key:pkix_crl_issuer(CRL),
 1297:     {rdnSequence,_} = public_key:pkix_crl_issuer(ERLCRL),
 1298:     
 1299:     true = public_key:pkix_crl_verify(CRL, SignCert),
 1300:     true = public_key:pkix_crl_verify(ERLCRL, OTPSignCert),
 1301: 
 1302:     [#'DistributionPoint'{}|_] = public_key:pkix_dist_points(IDPCert),
 1303:     [#'DistributionPoint'{}|_] = public_key:pkix_dist_points(OTPIDPCert),
 1304: 
 1305:     #'DistributionPoint'{cRLIssuer = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1306:      			 reasons = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1307: 			 distributionPoint =  Point} = public_key:pkix_dist_point(IDPCert),
 1308:     #'DistributionPoint'{cRLIssuer = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1309: 			 reasons = asn1_NOVALUE,
 1310: 			 distributionPoint =  Point} = public_key:pkix_dist_point(OTPIDPCert).
 1311: 
 1312: general_name() ->
 1313:     [{doc, "Test that decoding of general name filed may have other values"
 1314:       " than {rdnSequence,  Seq}"}].
 1315: 
 1316: general_name(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1317:     DummyRfc822Name = "CN=CNDummy, OU=OUDummy, O=ODummy, C=SE",
 1318:     {ok, {1,  DummyRfc822Name}} = 
 1319: 	pubkey_cert:cert_auth_key_id(
 1320: 	  #'AuthorityKeyIdentifier'{authorityCertIssuer = 
 1321: 					[{rfc822Name, DummyRfc822Name}],
 1322: 				    authorityCertSerialNumber = 
 1323: 					1}).
 1324:

 1328:      [{doc, "Test API function pkix_hash_type/1"}].
 1329: 
 1330: pkix_hash_type(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1331:     sha = public_key:pkix_hash_type(?'id-sha1'), 
 1332:     sha512 = public_key:pkix_hash_type(?'id-sha512'),
 1333:     sha384 = public_key:pkix_hash_type(?'id-sha384'),
 1334:     sha256 = public_key:pkix_hash_type(?'id-sha256'), 
 1335:     sha224 = public_key:pkix_hash_type('id-sha224'),
 1336:     md5 = public_key:pkix_hash_type('id-md5').

 1339: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1340: 
 1341: pkix_test_data_all_default() ->
 1342:     [{doc, "Test API function pkix_test_data/1"}].
 1343: 
 1344: pkix_test_data_all_default(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1345:     #{server_config := ServerConf0,
 1346:       client_config := ClientConf0} = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => 
 1347:                                                                      #{root => [],
 1348:                                                                        intermediates => [[]],
 1349:                                                                        peer => []},
 1350:                                                                  client_chain => 
 1351:                                                                      #{root => [],
 1352:                                                                        intermediates => [[]],
 1353:                                                                        peer => []}}),
 1354:     check_conf_member(ServerConf0, [key, cert, cacerts]),
 1355:     check_conf_member(ClientConf0, [key, cert, cacerts]),
 1356:     
 1357:     3 = length(proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerConf0)),
 1358:     3 = length(proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerConf0)),
 1359: 
 1360:     #{server_config := ServerConf1,
 1361:       client_config := ClientConf1} = public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => 
 1362:                                                                      #{root => [],
 1363:                                                                        peer => []},
 1364:                                                                  client_chain => 
 1365:                                                                      #{root => [],
 1366:                                                                        peer => []}}),
 1367:     2 = length(proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerConf1)),
 1368:     2 = length(proplists:get_value(cacerts, ServerConf1)),
 1369:     
 1370:     check_conf_member(ServerConf1, [key, cert, cacerts]),
 1371:     check_conf_member(ClientConf1, [key, cert, cacerts]).
 1372:     
 1373: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1374: 
 1375: pkix_test_data() ->
 1376:     [{doc, "Test API function pkix_test_data/1"}].
 1377: 
 1378: pkix_test_data(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1379:     {Year, Month, Day} = date(),
 1380:     Keygen = 
 1381:         case crypto:ec_curves() of
 1382:         [] ->
 1383:             {rsa, 2048, 17};
 1384:         [Curve |_] ->
 1385:             Oid = pubkey_cert_records:namedCurves(Curve),
 1386:             {namedCurve, Oid}
 1387:         end,
 1388:     #{server_config := ServerConf0,
 1389:       client_config := ClientConf0} = 
 1390:         public_key:pkix_test_data(#{server_chain => 
 1391:                                         #{root => [],
 1392:                                           intermediates => [],
 1393:                                           peer => [{key, hardcode_rsa_key(1)}]},
 1394:                                     client_chain => 
 1395:                                         #{root => [{validity, {{Year-2, Month, Day}, 
 1396:                                                                {Year-1, Month, Day}}}],
 1397:                                           intermediates => 
 1398:                                               [[{extensions, [#'Extension'{extnID = ?'id-ce-basicConstraints',
 1399:                                                                            extnValue = #'BasicConstraints'{cA=true, 
 1400:                                                                                              pathLenConstraint = 1},
 1401:                                                                            critical = true}]}]],
 1402:                                                peer => [{key, Keygen}, {digest, sha1}]}}),
 1403:     check_conf_member(ServerConf0, [key, cert, cacerts]),
 1404:     check_conf_member(ClientConf0, [key, cert, cacerts]).
 1405: 
 1406:    
 1407:                                  
 1408: check_conf_member(_, []) ->
 1409:     true;
 1410: check_conf_member(Conf, [Member | Rest]) ->
 1411:     case lists:keymember(Member, 1, Conf) of
 1412:         true ->
 1413:             check_conf_member(Conf, Rest);
 1414:         false ->
 1415:             ct:fail({misssing_conf, Member})
 1416:     end.
 1417:                               
 1418: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1419: pkix_is_issuer() ->
 1420:     [{doc, "Test pubkey_cert:pkix_is_issuer with cert that have diffent cases on countryname"}].
 1421: 
 1422: pkix_is_issuer(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1423:     Upper = {rdnSequence,
 1424:              [[{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,6},"GB"}],
 1425:               [{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,10},{utf8String,<<"MYORG">>}}],
 1426:               [{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,11},{utf8String,<<"INTERMEDIATE">>}}],
 1427:               [{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,3},{utf8String,<<"INTERMEDIATE">>}}]]},
 1428:     Lower = {rdnSequence,
 1429:              [[{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,6},"gb"}],
 1430:               [{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,10},{utf8String,<<"MYORG">>}}],
 1431:               [{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,11},{utf8String,<<"INTERMEDIATE">>}}],
 1432:               [{'AttributeTypeAndValue',{2,5,4,3},{utf8String,<<"INTERMEDIATE">>}}]]},
 1433:     true = pubkey_cert:is_issuer(Upper, Lower).
 1434: 
 1435: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1436: short_cert_issuer_hash() ->
 1437:     [{doc, "Test OpenSSL-style hash for certificate issuer"}].
 1438: 
 1439: short_cert_issuer_hash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1440:     Datadir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
 1441:     [{'Certificate', CertDER, _}] =
 1442: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "client_cert.pem")),
 1443: 
 1444:     %% This hash value was obtained by running:
 1445:     %% openssl x509 -in client_cert.pem -issuer_hash -noout
 1446:     CertIssuerHash = "d4c8d7e5",
 1447: 
 1448:     #'OTPCertificate'{tbsCertificate = #'OTPTBSCertificate'{issuer = Issuer}} =
 1449: 	public_key:pkix_decode_cert(CertDER, otp),
 1450: 
 1451:     CertIssuerHash = public_key:short_name_hash(Issuer).
 1452: 
 1453: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1454: short_crl_issuer_hash() ->
 1455:     [{doc, "Test OpenSSL-style hash for CRL issuer"}].
 1456: 
 1457: short_crl_issuer_hash(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
 1458:     Datadir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
 1459:     [{'CertificateList', CrlDER, _}] =
 1460: 	erl_make_certs:pem_to_der(filename:join(Datadir, "idp_crl.pem")),
 1461: 
 1462:     %% This hash value was obtained by running:
 1463:     %% openssl crl -in idp_crl.pem -hash -noout
 1464:     CrlIssuerHash = "d6134ed3",
 1465: 
 1466:     Issuer = public_key:pkix_crl_issuer(CrlDER),
 1467: 
 1468:     CrlIssuerHash = public_key:short_name_hash(Issuer).
 1469:

 1489:     ExpectedExtentions =
 1490:         [{'Extension',
