 1576: 
 1577: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1578: cacerts_load() ->
 1579:     [{doc, "Basic tests of cacerts functionality"}].
 1580: cacerts_load(Config) ->
 1581:     Datadir = proplists:get_value(data_dir, Config),
 1582:     {error, enoent} = public_key:cacerts_load("/dummy.file"),
 1583: 
 1584:     %% White box testing of paths loading
 1585:     %% TestDirs
 1586:     ok = pubkey_os_cacerts:load([filename:join(Datadir, "non_existing_dir"),
 1587:                                  Datadir,
 1588:                                  filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem")
 1589:                                 ]),
 1590:     true = 10 < length(public_key:cacerts_get()),
 1591:     %% We currently pick the first found in input order
 1592:     ok = pubkey_os_cacerts:load([filename:join(Datadir, "non_existing_file"),
 1593:                                  filename:join(Datadir, "ldap_uri_cert.pem"),
 1594:                                  filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem")]),
 1595:     1 = length(public_key:cacerts_get()),
 1596:     ok = pubkey_os_cacerts:load([filename:join(Datadir, "non_existing_file"),
 1597:                                  filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem"),
 1598:                                  filename:join(Datadir, "ldap_uri_cert.pem")]),
 1599:     2 = length(public_key:cacerts_get()),
 1600: 
 1601:     true = public_key:cacerts_clear(),
 1602: 
 1603:     LinkedCaCerts = filename:join(Datadir, "link_to_cacerts.pem"),
 1604:     case file:make_symlink(filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem"), LinkedCaCerts) of
 1605:         ok ->
 1606:             ok = pubkey_os_cacerts:load([LinkedCaCerts]),
 1607:             2 = length(public_key:cacerts_get()),
 1608:             true = public_key:cacerts_clear(),
 1609:             ok = file:delete(LinkedCaCerts);
 1610:         _ ->
 1611:             ok
 1612:     end,
 1613: 
 1614:     %% Load default OS certs
 1615:     %%    there is no default installed OS certs on netbsd
 1616:     %%    can be installed with 'pkgin install mozilla-rootcerts'
 1617:     IsNetBsd = element(2, os:type()) =:= netbsd,
 1618:     OsCerts = try
 1619:                   Certs = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 1620:                   true = public_key:cacerts_clear(),
 1621:                   Certs
 1622:               catch _:{badmatch, {error, enoent}} when IsNetBsd -> netbsd
 1623:               end,
 1624: 
 1625:     false = public_key:cacerts_clear(),
 1626: 
 1627:     %% Reload from file
 1628:     ok = public_key:cacerts_load(filename:join(Datadir, "cacerts.pem")),
 1629:     [_TestCert1, _TestCert2] = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 1630: 
 1631:     %% Re-Load default OS certs
 1632:     try
 1633:         process_flag(trap_exit, true),
 1634:         flush(),
 1635:         ok = public_key:cacerts_load(),
 1636:         [] = flush(),
 1637:         ct:log("~p: ~p~n", [os:type(), length(OsCerts)]),
 1638:         OsCerts = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 1639:         Ids = cert_info(OsCerts),
 1640:         Check = fun(ShouldBeThere) ->
 1641:                         lists:any(fun(#{id:=Id}) -> lists:prefix(ShouldBeThere, Id) end, Ids)
 1642:                 end,
 1643:         case lists:partition(Check, ["digicert", "globalsign"]) of
 1644:             {_, []} -> ok;
 1645:             {_, Fail} ->
 1646:                 cert_info(OsCerts),
 1647:                 [] = Fail
 1648:         end,
 1649:         ok
 1650:     catch _:{badmatch, {error, enoent}} when IsNetBsd ->
 1651:             ok
 1652:     end.
 1653: 
 1654: flush() ->
 1655:     receive Msg -> [Msg|flush()]
 1656:     after 500 -> []
 1657:     end.
 1658: 
 1659: cert_info([#cert{der=Der, otp=#'OTPCertificate'{tbsCertificate = C0}=Cert}|Rest]) when is_binary(Der) ->
 1660:     #'OTPTBSCertificate'{subject = Subject, serialNumber = _Nr, issuer = Issuer0} = C0,
 1661:     C = case public_key:pkix_is_self_signed(Cert) of
 1662:             true  -> #{id => subject(Subject), ss => true};
 1663:             false ->
 1664:                 case public_key:pkix_issuer_id(Cert, other) of
 1665:                     {ok, {_IsNr, Issuer}} ->
 1666:                         #{id => subject(Subject), ss => false, issuer => subject(Issuer)};
 1667:                     {error, _} ->
 1668:                         #{id => subject(Subject), ss => false, issuer => subject(Issuer0)}
 1669:                 end
 1670:         end,
 1671:     [C|cert_info(Rest)];
 1672: cert_info([]) ->
 1673:     [].
 1674: 
 1675: 
 1676: subject(S) ->
 1677:     string:lowercase(subject(public_key:pkix_normalize_name(S), "unknown")).
 1678: 
 1679: subject({rdnSequence, Seq}, Def) ->
 1680:     subject(Seq, Def);
 1681: subject([[{'AttributeTypeAndValue', ?'id-at-commonName', Name0}]|_], _Def) ->
 1682:     case Name0 of
 1683:         {printableString, Name} -> Name;
 1684:         {utf8String, Name} -> unicode:characters_to_list(Name);
 1685:         Name -> Name
 1686:     end;
 1687: subject([[{'AttributeTypeAndValue', ?'id-at-organizationName', Name0}]|Rest], _Def) ->
 1688:     Name = case Name0 of
 1689:                {printableString, Name1} -> Name1;
 1690:                {utf8String, Name1} -> unicode:characters_to_list(Name1);
 1691:                Name1 -> Name1
 1692:            end,
 1693:     subject(Rest, Name);
 1694: subject([_|R], Def) ->
 1695:     subject(R, Def);
 1696: subject([], Def) ->
 1697:     Def.
 1698: 
 1699: list_cacerts() ->
 1700:     Certs = public_key:cacerts_get(),
 1701:     %% io:format("~P~n",[Certs, 20]),
 1702:     IO = fun(C, N) -> io:format("~.3w:~0p~n", [N,C]), N+1 end,
 1703:     lists:foldl(IO, 0, lists:sort(cert_info(Certs))),
 1704:     ok.
 1705: 
 1706: 
 1707: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1708: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 1709: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1710: asn1_encode_decode({Asn1Type, Der, not_encrypted} = Entry) ->
 1711:     Decoded = public_key:der_decode(Asn1Type, Der),
 1712:     Decoded = public_key:pem_entry_decode(Entry),
 1713:     Entry = public_key:pem_entry_encode(Asn1Type, Decoded),
 1714:     ok.
 1715:     
 1716: check_countryname({rdnSequence,DirName}) ->
 1717:     do_check_countryname(DirName).
 1718: do_check_countryname([]) ->
 1719:     ok;
 1720: do_check_countryname([#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{type = ?'id-at-countryName',
 1721: 					       value = "US"}|_]) ->
 1722:     ok;
 1723: do_check_countryname([#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{type = ?'id-at-countryName',
 1724: 					       value =  Value}|_]) ->
 1725:     ct:fail({incorrect_country_name, Value});
 1726: do_check_countryname([_| Rest]) ->
 1727:     do_check_countryname(Rest).
 1728: 
 1729: check_emailaddress({rdnSequence,DirName}) ->
 1730:     do_check_emailaddress(DirName).
 1731: do_check_emailaddress([]) ->
 1732:     ok;
 1733: do_check_emailaddress([#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{type = ?'id-emailAddress',
 1734: 					       value = "invalid@email.com"}|_]) ->
 1735:     ok;
 1736: do_check_emailaddress([#'AttributeTypeAndValue'{type = ?'id-emailAddress',
 1737: 					       value =  Value}|_]) ->
 1738:     ct:fail({incorrect_email_address, Value});
 1739: do_check_emailaddress([_| Rest]) ->
 1740:     do_check_emailaddress(Rest).
 1741: 
 1742: check_entry_type(#'DSAPrivateKey'{}, 'DSAPrivateKey') ->
 1743:     true;
 1744: check_entry_type(#'RSAPrivateKey'{}, 'RSAPrivateKey') ->
 1745:     true;
 1746: check_entry_type(#'RSAPublicKey'{}, 'RSAPublicKey') ->
 1747:     true;
 1748: check_entry_type({_Int, #'Dss-Parms'{}}, 'DSAPublicKey') when is_integer(_Int) ->
 1749:     true;
 1750: check_entry_type(#'DHParameter'{}, 'DHParameter') ->
 1751:     true;
 1752: check_entry_type(#'Certificate'{}, 'Certificate') ->
 1753:     true;
 1754: check_entry_type({#'ECPoint'{}, _}, 'ECPoint') ->
 1755:     true;
 1756: check_entry_type(#'ECPrivateKey'{}, 'ECPrivateKey') ->
 1757:     true;
 1758: check_entry_type({namedCurve, _}, 'EcpkParameters') ->
 1759:     true;
 1760: check_entry_type({ecParameters, #'ECParameters'{}}, 'EcpkParameters') ->
 1761:     true;
 1762: check_entry_type(_,_) ->
 1763:     false.
 1764: 
 1765: check_encapsulated_header(Pem) when is_binary(Pem)->
 1766:     check_encapsulated_header( binary:split(Pem, <<"\n">>, [global]));
 1767: check_encapsulated_header([<<"DEK-Info: DES-CBC,FB7577791A9056A1">>, <<>> | _]) ->
 1768:     true;
 1769: check_encapsulated_header([ _ | Rest]) ->
 1770:     check_encapsulated_header(Rest);
 1771: check_encapsulated_header([]) ->
 1772:     false.
 1773: 
 1774: strip_superfluous_newlines(Bin) ->
 1775:     Str = string:strip(binary_to_list(Bin), right, 10),
 1776:     re:replace(Str,"\n\n","\n", [{return,list}, global]).
 1777: 
 1778: do_gen_ec_param(File) ->    
 1779:     {ok, KeyPem} = file:read_file(File),
 1780:     Entries = public_key:pem_decode(KeyPem),
 1781:     [ParamInfo] = [Entry || Entry={'EcpkParameters', _, not_encrypted} <- Entries],
 1782:     {ecParameters, Params} = public_key:pem_entry_decode(ParamInfo),
 1783:     Key = public_key:generate_key(Params),
 1784:     case check_entry_type(Key, 'ECPrivateKey') of
 1785:         true ->
 1786:             ok;
 1787:         false ->
 1788:             ct:fail({key_gen_fail, File})
 1789:     end.
 1790: 
 1791: init_per_testcase_gen_ec_param(_TC, Curve, Config) ->
 1792:     case crypto:ec_curves() of
 1793:         [] ->
 1794:             {skip, missing_ec_support};
 1795:         Curves ->
 1796:             case lists:member(Curve, Curves)
 1797:                 andalso crypto_supported_curve(Curve, Curves)
 1798:             of
 1799:                 true ->
 1800:                     init_common_per_testcase(Config);
 1801:                 false ->
 1802:                     {skip, {missing_ec_support, Curve}}
 1803:             end
 1804:     end.
 1805: 
 1806: 
 1807: crypto_supported_curve(Curve, _Curves) ->
 1808:     try crypto:generate_key(ecdh, Curve) of
 1809:         {error,_} -> false; % Just in case crypto is changed in the future...
 1810:         _-> true
 1811:     catch
 1812:         _:_-> false
 1813:     end.
